mapper.sql: select rownum idx, book_no, name, price, intro, writer, p.pub_name, c.category_name, contents from book_info b, publisher p, category c where b.pub_no = p.pub_no and c.category_no = b.category_no and b.deleted = '0'
mapper.select: select img from book_img where book_no = #{book_no} order by img
select b.book_no, b.price, b.name from book_info b, category c where b.book_no != #{book_no} and c.category_no = b.category_no and c.category_name like '${category_name}'
and rownum <= 10 order by book_no desc
select count(*) from book_info where deleted = '0'
select count(category_no) from book_info where category_no = #{categoryNo} and deleted = '1' group by category_no
